vicedtools.naplan package

Submodules

vicedtools.naplan.dataservicesession module

A requests.requests.Session class for accessing the VCAA data service.

class vicedtools.naplan.dataservicesession.DataServiceConfigAuthenticator(username, password)

Bases: DataserviceAuthenticator

Authenticates using a provided username and password.

authenticate(s)
exception vicedtools.naplan.dataservicesession.DataserviceAuthenticationError

Bases: Exception

Authentication with Data Service failed.

class vicedtools.naplan.dataservicesession.DataserviceAuthenticator(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Protocol

An abstract class for generic Data Service authenticators.

abstract authenticate(session)
class vicedtools.naplan.dataservicesession.DataserviceSession(authenticator)

Bases: Session

A requests Session extension with methods for accessing data from the VCAA data service.

Creates a requests Session with Data Service authentication completed.

Parameters

authenticator – An instance of DataserviceAuthenticator to perform the required authentication.

export_naplan(year, save_dir)

Downloads the outcome and question results for NAPLAN.

Prepends the year to the filenames. Currently only downloads Year 7 and Year 9.

Parameters

  • year – The test year to download.encoding=

  • save_dir – The folder to save the exports in.

export_sssr(year, save_dir)
get_naplan_years()

vicedtools.naplan.sssrdata module

A class for extracting data from the NAPLAN SSSR data.js file.

class vicedtools.naplan.sssrdata.SSSRdata(js_file)

Bases: object

A class for extracting data from the NAPLAN SSSR data.js file.

data

A dictionary containing the raw data from the data.js file.

domains

A DataFrame containing metadata about NAPLAN test domains.

subdomains

A DataFrame containing metadata about NAPLAN test subdomains.

questions

A DataFrame containing metadata about NAPLAN test questions.

responses

A DataFrame containing the individual item responses for all students.

bands

A DataFrame containing band cutoff metadata for each test.

Parses the data contained in the data.js file.

Parameters

js_file – The path to the SSSR data.js file.

download_exemplar_images(path)

Downloads the images for exemplar test items to the given path.

Attempts to download all test items. Skips items that have already been downloaded. Images are named with the corresponding question identifier.

Parameters

path – The folder to save the images in.
